name: Mightyena
description: The Bite Pokémon. Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Quick Feet
abilities.description: When suffering from a negative status condition, this Pokémon’s speed increases by 15 ft.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon may immediately take another action.
